62 template<typename CharT, typename Traits>
63 class basic_FancyOStream_buf : public std::basic_streambuf<CharT,Traits>
64 {
65 public:
66 
68  typedef CharT char_type;
70  typedef Traits traits_type;
72  typedef typename traits_type::int_type int_type;
74  typedef typename traits_type::pos_type pos_type;
76  typedef typename traits_type::off_type off_type;
77 
79  basic_FancyOStream_buf(
80  const RCP<std::basic_ostream<char_type,traits_type> > &oStream
81  ,const std::basic_string<char_type,traits_type> &tabIndentStr
82  ,const int startingTab
83  ,const bool showLinePrefix
84  ,const int maxLenLinePrefix
85  ,const bool showTabCount
86  ,const bool showProcRank
87  );
88

91  const RCP<std::basic_ostream<char_type,traits_type> > &oStream
92  ,const std::basic_string<char_type,traits_type> &tabIndentStr
93  ,const int startingTab
94  ,const bool showLinePrefix
95  ,const int maxLenLinePrefix
96  ,const bool showTabCount
97  ,const bool showProcRank
98  );
99

102

187  void imbue(const locale& l)
188  {
189  std::cerr << "\ncalled imbue()\n";
190  std::basic_streambuf<CharT,Traits>::imbue(l);
191  }

198  }

212  }

219  }

226  }

333 template <typename CharT, typename Traits = std::char_traits<CharT> >
334 class basic_FancyOStream : public std::basic_ostream<CharT, Traits>
335 {
336 public:
337 
339 
340 
342  typedef CharT char_type;
344  typedef Traits traits_type;
346  typedef typename traits_type::int_type int_type;
348  typedef typename traits_type::pos_type pos_type;
350  typedef typename traits_type::off_type off_type;
354  typedef basic_FancyOStream_buf<CharT,Traits> streambuf_t;
356  typedef std::basic_ostream<char_type, traits_type> ostream_t;
357 
359 
361 
362 
364  explicit
365  basic_FancyOStream(
366  const RCP< std::basic_ostream<char_type,traits_type> > &oStream
367  ,const std::basic_string<char_type,traits_type> &tabIndentStr = " "
368  ,const int startingTab = 0
369  ,const bool showLinePrefix = false
370  ,const int maxLenLinePrefix = 10
371  ,const bool showTabCount = false
372  ,const bool showProcRank = false
373  );
374 
376  void initialize(
377  const RCP< std::basic_ostream<char_type,traits_type> > &oStream
378  ,const std::basic_string<char_type,traits_type> &tabIndentStr = " "
379  ,const int startingTab = 0
380  ,const bool showLinePrefix = false
381  ,const int maxLenLinePrefix = 10
382  ,const bool showTabCount = false
383  ,const bool showProcRank = false
384  );
385 
387  RCP<std::basic_ostream<char_type,traits_type> > getOStream();
388 
390  basic_FancyOStream& setTabIndentStr(
391  const std::basic_string<char_type,traits_type> &tabIndentStr
392  );
393 
395  const std::basic_string<char_type,traits_type>& getTabIndentStr() const;
396 
398  basic_FancyOStream& setShowAllFrontMatter(const bool showAllFrontMatter);
399 
401  basic_FancyOStream& setShowLinePrefix(const bool showLinePrefix);
402 
404  basic_FancyOStream& setMaxLenLinePrefix(const int maxLenLinePrefix);
405 
407  basic_FancyOStream& setShowTabCount(const bool showTabCount);
408 
410  basic_FancyOStream& setShowProcRank(const bool showProcRank);
411 
413  basic_FancyOStream& setProcRankAndSize( const int procRank, const int numProcs );
414 
416  basic_FancyOStream& setOutputToRootOnly( const int rootRank );
417 
419  int getOutputToRootOnly() const;
420 
422  void copyAllOutputOptions(const basic_FancyOStream<CharT,Traits> &oStream);
423 
425 
427 
428 
430  void pushTab(const int tabs = 1);
431 
433  int getNumCurrTabs() const;
434 
436  void popTab();
437 
439  void pushLinePrefix(const std::basic_string<char_type,traits_type> &linePrefix);
440 
442  void popLinePrefix();
443 
445  const std::basic_string<char_type,traits_type>& getTopLinePrefix() const;
446 
448  void pushDisableTabbing();
449 
451  void popDisableTabbing();
452

455 private:
456 
457  streambuf_t streambuf_;
458 
459  // Not defined and not to be called
460  basic_FancyOStream();
461  basic_FancyOStream(const basic_FancyOStream<CharT,Traits>&);
462  basic_FancyOStream<CharT,Traits> operator=(const basic_FancyOStream<CharT,Traits>&);
463 
464 };
465 
466 
474 inline
475 RCP<basic_FancyOStream<char> >
476 fancyOStream(
477  const RCP< std::basic_ostream<char> >& oStream,
478  const std::basic_string<char>& tabIndentStr = " ",
479  const int startingTab = 0,
480  const bool showLinePrefix = false,
481  const int maxLenLinePrefix = 10,
482  const bool showTabCount = false,
483  const bool showProcRank = false
484  )
485 {
486  if (nonnull(oStream)) {
487  return rcp(
488  new basic_FancyOStream<char>(
489  oStream,tabIndentStr,startingTab,showLinePrefix,
490  maxLenLinePrefix,showTabCount,showProcRank
491  )
492  );
493  }
494  return null;
495 }
496 
497 
506 inline
507 RCP<basic_FancyOStream<char> >
508 getFancyOStream( const RCP<std::basic_ostream<char> > &out )
509 {
510  if (is_null(out))
511  return Teuchos::null;
512  RCP<basic_FancyOStream<char> >
513  fancyOut = rcp_dynamic_cast<basic_FancyOStream<char> >(out);
514  if(nonnull(fancyOut))
515  return fancyOut;
516  return rcp(new basic_FancyOStream<char>(out));
517 }
518 
519 
531 template <typename CharT, typename Traits = std::char_traits<CharT> >
532 class basic_OSTab
533 {
534 public:
535 
537  static const int DISABLE_TABBING = -99999; // This magic number should be just fine!
539  basic_OSTab(
540  const RCP<basic_FancyOStream<CharT,Traits> > &fancyOStream
541  ,const int tabs = 1
542  ,const std::basic_string<CharT,Traits> linePrefix = ""
543  )
544  :fancyOStream_(fancyOStream)
545  ,tabs_(tabs)
546  ,linePrefix_(linePrefix)
547  {
548  updateState();
549  }
551  basic_OSTab(
552  const RCP<std::basic_ostream<CharT,Traits> > &oStream
553  ,const int tabs = 1
554  ,const std::basic_string<CharT,Traits> linePrefix = ""
555  )
556  :fancyOStream_(getFancyOStream(oStream))
557  ,tabs_(tabs)
558  ,linePrefix_(linePrefix)
559  {
560  updateState();
561  }
563  basic_OSTab(
564  basic_FancyOStream<CharT,Traits> &fancyOStream
565  ,const int tabs = 1
566  ,const std::basic_string<CharT,Traits> linePrefix = ""
567  )
568  :fancyOStream_(rcp(&fancyOStream,false))
569  ,tabs_(tabs)
570  ,linePrefix_(linePrefix)
571  {
572  updateState();
573  }
575  basic_OSTab(
576  std::basic_ostream<CharT,Traits> &oStream
577  ,const int tabs = 1
578  ,const std::basic_string<CharT,Traits> linePrefix = ""
579  )
580  :fancyOStream_(getFancyOStream(rcp(&oStream, false)))
581  ,tabs_(tabs)
582  ,linePrefix_(linePrefix)
583  {
584  updateState();
585  }
587  basic_OSTab( const basic_OSTab &osTab )
588  :fancyOStream_(osTab.fancyOStream_)
589  ,tabs_(osTab.tabs_)
590  {
591  updateState();
592  }
594  ~basic_OSTab()
595  {
596  if(fancyOStream_.get()) {
597  if(tabs_==DISABLE_TABBING)
598  fancyOStream_->popDisableTabbing();
599  else
600  fancyOStream_->popTab();
601  if(linePrefix_.length()) fancyOStream_->popLinePrefix();
602  }
603  }
605  basic_OSTab<CharT,Traits>& operator=( const basic_OSTab &osTab )
606  {
607  fancyOStream_ = osTab.fancyOStream_;
608  tabs_ = osTab.tabs_;
609  updateState();
610  return *this;
611  }
613  basic_OSTab<CharT,Traits>& incrTab(const int tabs = 1)
614  {
615  tabs_ += tabs;
616  if(fancyOStream_.get()) {
617  fancyOStream_->popTab();
618  fancyOStream_->pushTab(tabs_);
619  }
620  return *this;
621  }
623  basic_FancyOStream<CharT,Traits>& o() const
624  {
625  return *fancyOStream_;
626  }
628  basic_FancyOStream<CharT,Traits>* get() const
629  {
630  return fancyOStream_.get();
631  }
632 
633 private:
634 
635  RCP<basic_FancyOStream<CharT,Traits> > fancyOStream_;
636  int tabs_;
637  std::basic_string<CharT,Traits> linePrefix_;
638 
639  void updateState()
640  {
641  if(fancyOStream_.get()) {
642  if(tabs_==DISABLE_TABBING)
643  fancyOStream_->pushDisableTabbing();
644  else
645  fancyOStream_->pushTab(tabs_);
646  if(linePrefix_.length()) fancyOStream_->pushLinePrefix(linePrefix_);
647  }
648  }
649 
650 };
651 
652 
668 template <typename CharT, typename Traits>
669 RCP<basic_FancyOStream<CharT,Traits> >
670 tab(
671  const RCP<basic_FancyOStream<CharT,Traits> > &out,
672  const int tabs = 1,
673  const std::basic_string<CharT,Traits> linePrefix = ""
674  )
675 {
676  if(out.get()==NULL)
677  return Teuchos::null;
678  RCP<basic_FancyOStream<CharT,Traits> > fancyOut = out;
679  set_extra_data(
680  rcp(new basic_OSTab<CharT,Traits>(out,tabs,linePrefix)),
681  "OSTab",
682  inOutArg(fancyOut),
683  PRE_DESTROY,
684  false
685  );
686  return fancyOut;
687 }
688 
689 
705 template <typename CharT, typename Traits>
706 RCP<basic_FancyOStream<CharT,Traits> >
707 tab(
708  const RCP<std::basic_ostream<CharT,Traits> > &out
709  ,const int tabs = 1
710  ,const std::basic_string<CharT,Traits> linePrefix = ""
711  )
712 {
713  return tab(getFancyOStream(out),tabs,linePrefix);
714 }

736 #define TEUCHOS_OSTAB ::Teuchos::OSTab __localThisTab = this->getOSTab()

747 
748 //
749 // basic_FancyOStream_buf
750 //
751 
752 
753 template<typename CharT, typename Traits>
754 basic_FancyOStream_buf<CharT,Traits>::basic_FancyOStream_buf(
755  const RCP<std::basic_ostream<char_type,traits_type> > &oStream
756  ,const std::basic_string<char_type,traits_type> &tabIndentStr
757  ,const int startingTab
758  ,const bool showLinePrefix
759  ,const int maxLenLinePrefix
760  ,const bool showTabCount
761  ,const bool showProcRank
762  )
763 {
764  this->initialize(oStream,tabIndentStr,startingTab,showLinePrefix,
765  maxLenLinePrefix,showTabCount,showProcRank);
766 }
767 
768 
769 template<typename CharT, typename Traits>
770 void basic_FancyOStream_buf<CharT,Traits>::initialize(
771  const RCP<std::basic_ostream<char_type,traits_type> > &oStream
772  ,const std::basic_string<char_type,traits_type> &tabIndentStr
773  ,const int startingTab
774  ,const bool showLinePrefix
775  ,const int maxLenLinePrefix
776  ,const bool showTabCount
777  ,const bool showProcRank
778  )
779 {
780  oStreamSet_ = oStream;
781  oStream_ = oStream;
782  tabIndentStr_ = tabIndentStr;
783  showLinePrefix_ = showLinePrefix;
784  maxLenLinePrefix_ = maxLenLinePrefix;
785  showTabCount_ = showTabCount;
786  showProcRank_ = showProcRank;
787  rootRank_ = -1;
788  procRank_ = GlobalMPISession::getRank();
789  numProcs_ = GlobalMPISession::getNProc();
790  rankPrintWidth_ = int(std::log10(float(numProcs_)))+1;
791  tabIndent_ = startingTab;
792  tabIndentStack_.clear();
793  linePrefixStack_.clear();
794  wroteNewline_ = true;
795  enableTabbingStack_ = 0;
796 }
797 
798 
799 template<typename CharT, typename Traits>
800 RCP<std::basic_ostream<CharT,Traits> >
801 basic_FancyOStream_buf<CharT,Traits>::getOStream()
802 {
803  return oStreamSet_;
804 }

904 
905 template<typename CharT, typename Traits>
906 void basic_FancyOStream_buf<CharT,Traits>::setOutputToRootOnly(
907  const int rootRank
908  )
909 {
910  rootRank_ = rootRank;
911  if(rootRank >= 0) {
912  if(rootRank == procRank_)
913  oStream_ = oStreamSet_;
914  else
915  oStream_ = rcp(new oblackholestream());
916  // Only processor is being output to so there is no need for line
917  // batching!
918  lineOut_ = null;
919  }
920  else {
921  oStream_ = oStreamSet_;
922  // Output is being sent to all processors so we need line batching to
923  // insure that each line will be printed all together!
924  lineOut_ = rcp(new std::ostringstream());
925  }
926 }
927 
928 
929 template<typename CharT, typename Traits>
930 int basic_FancyOStream_buf<CharT,Traits>::getOutputToRootOnly() const
931 {
932  return rootRank_;
933 }
934 
935 
936 template<typename CharT, typename Traits>
937 void basic_FancyOStream_buf<CharT,Traits>::pushTab(const int tabs)
938 {
939  if( tabIndent_ + tabs < 0 ) {
940  tabIndentStack_.push_back(-tabIndent_);
941  tabIndent_ = 0;
942  }
943  else {
944  tabIndentStack_.push_back(tabs);
945  tabIndent_ += tabs;
946  }
947 }
948 
949 
950 template<typename CharT, typename Traits>
951 int basic_FancyOStream_buf<CharT,Traits>::getNumCurrTabs() const
952 {
953  return tabIndent_;
954 }
955 
956 
957 template<typename CharT, typename Traits>
958 void basic_FancyOStream_buf<CharT,Traits>::popTab()
959 {
960  tabIndent_ -= tabIndentStack_.back();
961  tabIndentStack_.pop_back();
962 }
963 
964 
965 template<typename CharT, typename Traits>
966 void basic_FancyOStream_buf<CharT,Traits>::pushLinePrefix(
967  const std::basic_string<char_type,traits_type> &linePrefix
968  )
969 {
970  linePrefixStack_.push_back(linePrefix);
971 }
972 
973 
974 template<typename CharT, typename Traits>
975 void basic_FancyOStream_buf<CharT,Traits>::popLinePrefix()
976 {
977  linePrefixStack_.pop_back();
978 }

981 template<typename CharT, typename Traits>
982 const std::basic_string<CharT,Traits>&
983 basic_FancyOStream_buf<CharT,Traits>::getTopLinePrefix() const
984 {
985  return linePrefixStack_.back();
986 }

1000 }

1005 
1006 template<typename CharT, typename Traits>
1007 std::streamsize basic_FancyOStream_buf<CharT,Traits>::xsputn(
1008  const char_type* s, std::streamsize n
1009  )
1010 {
1011 #ifdef TEUCHOS_FANCY_OSTREAM_SHOW_ALL_CALLS
1012  std::cerr << "\ncalled xsputn()\n";
1013 #endif
1014  writeChars(s,n);
1015  return n;
1016 }
1017 
1018 
1019 template<typename CharT, typename Traits>
1020 typename basic_FancyOStream_buf<CharT,Traits>::int_type
1021 basic_FancyOStream_buf<CharT,Traits>::overflow(int_type c)
1022 {
1023 #ifdef TEUCHOS_FANCY_OSTREAM_SHOW_ALL_CALLS
1024  std::cerr << "\ncalled overflow()\n";
1025 #endif
1026  if(c != traits_type::eof()) {
1027  const char_type cc[] = { traits_type::to_char_type(c) };
1028  this->writeChars(cc,1);
1029  }
1030  return traits_type::not_eof(c);
1031  //return std::basic_streambuf<CharT,Traits>::overflow(c);
1032 }
1033 
1034 
1035 // private
1036 
1037 
1038 template<typename CharT, typename Traits>
1039 std::ostream& basic_FancyOStream_buf<CharT,Traits>::out()
1040 {
1041  if(lineOut_.get())
1042  return *lineOut_;
1043  return *oStream_;
1044 }
1045 
1046 
1047 template<typename CharT, typename Traits>
1048 void basic_FancyOStream_buf<CharT,Traits>::writeChars(
1049  const char_type s[], std::streamsize n
1050  )
1051 {
1052  if(n == 0) return;
1053  std::streamsize p = 0, first_p = 0;
1054  bool done_outputting = false;
1055  const char_type newline = '\n';
1056  while( !done_outputting ) {
1057  // Find the next newline
1058  for( p = first_p; p < n; ++p ) {
1059  if(s[p] == newline) {
1060  break;
1061  }
1062  }
1063  if(p == n) {
1064  // We did not find a newline at the end!
1065  --p;
1066  done_outputting = true;
1067  }
1068  else if( p == n-1 && s[p] == newline ) {
1069  // The last character in the std::string is a newline
1070  done_outputting = true;
1071  }
1072  // Write the beginning of the line if we need to
1073  if(wroteNewline_) {
1074  writeFrontMatter();
1075  wroteNewline_ = false;
1076  }
1077  // Write up to the newline or the end of the std::string
1078  out().write(s+first_p,p-first_p+1);
1079  if(s[p] == newline) {
1080  wroteNewline_ = true;
1081  if(lineOut_.get()) {
1082  *oStream_ << lineOut_->str() << std::flush;
1083  lineOut_->str("");
1084  }
1085  }
1086  // Update for next search
1087  if(!done_outputting)
1088  first_p = p+1;
1089  }
1090 }
1091 
1092 
1093 template<typename CharT, typename Traits>
1094 void basic_FancyOStream_buf<CharT,Traits>::writeFrontMatter()
1095 {
1096  bool didOutput = false;
1097  std::ostream &o = this->out();
1098  if(showProcRank_) {
1099  o << "p=" << std::right << std::setw(rankPrintWidth_) << procRank_;
1100  didOutput = true;
1101  }
1102  if(showLinePrefix_) {
1103  if(didOutput)
1104  o << ", ";
1105  std::string currLinePrefix = "";
1106  if ( linePrefixStack_.size() )
1107  currLinePrefix = this->getTopLinePrefix();
1108  const int localMaxLenLinePrefix =
1109  TEUCHOS_MAX( as<int>(currLinePrefix.length()), maxLenLinePrefix_ );
1110  o << std::left << std::setw(localMaxLenLinePrefix);
1111  o << currLinePrefix;
1112  didOutput = true;
1113  }
1114  if(showTabCount_) {
1115  if(didOutput)
1116  o << ", ";
1117  o << "tabs=" << std::right << std::setw(2) << tabIndent_;
1118  didOutput = true;
1119  }
1120  // ToDo: Add the Prefix name if asked
1121  // ToDo: Add the processor number if asked
1122  // ToDo: Add the number of indents if asked
1123  if(didOutput) {
1124  o << " |" << tabIndentStr_;
1125  }
1126  if(enableTabbingStack_==0) {
1127  for( int i = 0; i < tabIndent_; ++i )
1128  o << tabIndentStr_;
1129  }
1130 }
1131 
1132 
1133 //
1134 // basic_FancyOStream
1135 //

1138 template<typename CharT, typename Traits>
1139 basic_FancyOStream<CharT,Traits>::basic_FancyOStream(
1140  const RCP< std::basic_ostream<char_type,traits_type> > &oStream
1141  ,const std::basic_string<char_type,traits_type> &tabIndentStr
1142  ,const int startingTab
1143  ,const bool showLinePrefix
1144  ,const int maxLenLinePrefix
1145  ,const bool showTabCount
1146  ,const bool showProcRank
1147  )
1148  :ostream_t(NULL),
1149  streambuf_(oStream,tabIndentStr,startingTab,showLinePrefix,
1150  maxLenLinePrefix,showTabCount,showProcRank)
1151 {
1152  this->init(&streambuf_);
1153 }

1156 template<typename CharT, typename Traits>
1157 void basic_FancyOStream<CharT,Traits>::initialize(
1158  const RCP< std::basic_ostream<char_type,traits_type> > &oStream
1159  ,const std::basic_string<char_type,traits_type> &tabIndentStr
1160  ,const int startingTab
1161  ,const bool showLinePrefix
1162  ,const int maxLenLinePrefix
1163  ,const bool showTabCount
1164  ,const bool showProcRank
1165  )
1166 {
1167  streambuf_.initialize(oStream,tabIndentStr,startingTab,
1168  showLinePrefix,maxLenLinePrefix,showTabCount,showProcRank);
1169  this->init(&streambuf_);
1170 }
